attributes.action: help make all homes be more energy self-sufficient
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I keep hearing more about cutting green house gas emissions and how we should all do our bit to help fight climate change.  However, there appears to be very little government action to help the everyday household meet this goal.  I therefore propose that new build homes are made to include renewable energy in their design, and for greater subsidies to be made available to add renewable energy generation to existing homes.
